gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਤਿਲ ਬਾਸ ਬਾਸ ਲੀਜੀਅਤ ਕੁਸਮ ਤੇ ਤਾਂ ਤੇ ਹੋਤ ਹੈ ਫੁਲੇਲ ਜਤਨ ਕੈ ਜਾਨੀਅੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Til Baas Baas Leejeeat Kousam Tay , Taan Tay Hot Hai Dhulayl Jatan Kai Jaaneeai ?
translation: Just as perfume is extracted from flowers and it is mixed in sesame oil and then with some effort, fragrant oil is prepared.

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਤੌ ਅੳੁਟਾੲਿ ਦੂਧ ਜਾਮਨ ਜਮਾੲਿ ਮਥ ਸੰਜਮ ਸਹਤ ਘ੍ਰਿਤ ਪ੍ਰਗਟਾੲਿ ਮਾਨੀਅੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Tau Aoutaai Doodh Jaaman Jamaai Mada , Sanjam Sahat Ghrit Pragataai Maaneeai ?
translation: Just as milk is hard boiled, cooled and a small quantity of coagulant is added to turn it into curd. This curd is churned and butter obtained. The butter is then turned into ghee (clarified butter).

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਕੂਅਾ ਖੋਦ ਕਰਿ ਬਸੁਧਾ ਧਸਾੲਿ ਕੋਠੀ ਲਾਜ ਕੳੁ ਬਹਾੲਿ ਡੋਲ ਕਾਢਿ ਜਲ ਅਾਨੀਅੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Kooaa Khod Kari Basudhaa Dhasaai Kotthee , Laaj Kau Bahaai Dol Kaaddhi Jal Aaneeai ?
translation: Just as earth is dug up to dig a well and then a frame of the size and shape of the well is pushed in, whence a bucket tied with long rope is used to pull out water.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ੳੁਪਦੇਸ ਤੈਸੇ ਭਾਵਨੀ ਭਕਤ ਭਾੲਿ ਘਟ ਘਟ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਪਹਿਚਾਨੀਅੈ ||੬੦੯||
transliteration: Gur Oupadays Taisay Bhaavanee Bhakat Bhaai , Ghat Ghat Pooran Braham Pahichaaneeai ?609?
translation: Similarly, if the precept of the True Guru when practiced devotedly and lovingly with every breath, then the perfect Lord becomes imminent in His splendour in everybody and all forms.  (609)
